item.title: about: Mozilla's Dino Tank
item.description: Cut out summary from your post content here.

item.title: Interview Concurrency Exercices
item.description: I’ve recently gone through a number of job interviews. As a warmup, I’ve attempted to find exercices in concurrency and I was a bit disappointed by what I’ve found. So here are a few, from the top of my head. I’ll add more as I think of them.

item.title: Building a Task Manager, part 1
item.description:
If you’re using Firefox Nightly, you may have noticed the early prototype of a new task manager appearing at about:processes (if you wish to check it out, open this address in your address bar). It will evolve a lot yet, but let’s take a look at how we have already.

In this entry: getting data from the operating system.

Note: If you wish to contribute to Firefox and give us a hand with the Fission project, you can find me on chat.mozilla.org - I’m Yoric.
